summary: Does the middle class have to run around in such worn out clothing? Time to distribute the wealth and get some color in the commons! This is a cleaning and retexture of the Belted Tunic for females.
descriptionHtml:
Does the middle class have to run around in such worn out clothing? Time to distribute the wealth and get some color in the commons! This is a cleaning and retexture of the Belted Tunic for females.  

Demonstration images are of Lydia with the following mods to change her appearance. None of the files from these mods are included in this upload. You can find them here on the Nexus.

Better Females by Bella - Makeup version 2
Coolsims Hair Pack
Covereyes - eyes 2
Coverwomen - coverwomen look_1
Fountain of Youth - Beauty Project v1-5
No Dirty Bodies - Caucasian Female Races - Main file
HD body and face textures for females
Beauty Faces for females by necKros


Some changes to Lydia were made using the Skyrim NPC Editor v0_52
author: Falcon21
